thread.title: The head of Goldman Sachs is preparing his exit -report

title: The head of Goldman Sachs is preparing his exit -report
text:
The head of Goldman Sachs is preparing his exit -report 8:06pm GMT - 01:43 
Goldman Sachs Chairman and CEO Lloyd Blankfein, the man who successfully led the world's most influential Wall Street bank through the financial crisis, is ready to call it quits sometime this year, paving the way for one his lieutenants to move into the top job.   
Goldman Sachs Chairman and CEO Lloyd Blankfein, the man who successfully led the world's most influential Wall Street bank through the financial crisis, is ready to call it quits sometime this year, paving the way for one his lieutenants to move into the top job.  //reut.rs/2IemdWw
